alert.note: Alert for Western Mogollon Rim (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 03 at 11:04AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Coconino County through 1130 AM MST... At 1104 AM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles northwest of Parks, or 27 miles northwest of Flagstaff, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Parks. This includes the following highways... Interstate 40 between mile markers 171 and 173, and between mile markers 178 and 184. State Route 64 between mile markers 187 and 189. Highway 180 between mile markers 226 and 243. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
